div.font: Imagine a school that could better prepare students today for the world of tomorrow, where they...​

li.font: Collaborate with people from all backgrounds;
Participate as members of a community;
Use the city and greenspaces as their classroom;
Learn, build, and think with creativity and joy.

br.font:
That school is Charlotte Lab School -
​Teaching and learning for the next generation.
